title: Aadhya Pink Sapphire & Diamond Floral Necklace - Statement Haaram
features: This exquisite necklace features a modern take on the traditional Haaram, showcasing delicate floral motifs. The intricate design is highlighted with meticulously placed pink sapphires and sparkling diamonds. The pendant adds a touch of elegance, completing the floral-inspired design. The necklace uses a flexible gold chain for comfortable wear.
